name: Touch / Tone
summary: I Am Robot And Proud is the name Toronto native Shaw-han Liem works under to create his singular brand of hypnotic, beguiling electronic pop music. Touch Tone is the highly anticipated full-length follow-up to his very popular 2008 album Uphill City. Like the previous record, Touch Tone is electronic pop music that energizes the listener and refreshes the ear yet Shaw-hans skill as clever pop composer has grown even more mesmerizing.
info:
• 艺术家: I Am Robot And Proud
  • 发行商: Darla Records
  • 发售日期: 2013年09月03日
